医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Primerdesign推出新的牡蛎诺如病毒检测方法Primerdesign（Novacyt 集团旗下）是一家专注于设计、制造、验证和供应实时 PCR 试剂盒和试剂的公司，今天推出了用于牡蛎中诺如病毒的 Genesig® Easy_oys 检测试剂盒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Primerdesign-launches-new-assay-for-norovirus-detection-in-oysters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Primerdesign-launches-new-assay-for-norovirus-detection-in-oysters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d695e5e9-18d0-4ba7-9c4e-2a12d9f91b16 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:19:00 -0400 Primerdesign launches new assay for norovirus detection in oysters
研究人员调查母乳喂养与降低乳腺癌风险之间的联系在“Breast Cancer Now”的新资助下，研究人员将调查母乳喂养与乳腺癌之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Researchers-to-investigate-the-link- Between-breastfeeding-and-lower-breast-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Researchers-to-investigate-the-link- Between-breastfeeding-and-lower-breast-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e19cf65b-aa91-4c99-9a1d-09e17e45c439 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:16:00 -0400 Researchers to investigate the link between breastfeeding and lower breast cancer risk
研究将单身满意度的提高与态度的变化联系起来如今，14至20岁的年轻人比十年前的同龄人对单身的满意度更高。这是美因茨约翰内斯古腾堡大学 (JGU) 心理学研究所进行的一项研究的结论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-links-increased-singlehood-satisfaction-with-evolving-attitudes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-links-increased-singlehood-satisfaction-with-evolving-attitudes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53d9644d-aa5b-4621-ba91-6b7c3f021c45 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:12:57 -0400 Study links increased singlehood satisfaction with evolving attitudes
非人类灵长类动物模型揭示了早期阿尔茨海默病的进展对非人类灵长类动物的研究为在广泛的脑细胞死亡和痴呆症出现之前测试阿尔茨海默氏症和类似疾病早期阶段的治疗方法提供了可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Non human-primate-model-reveals-early-stage-Alzheimere28099s-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Non human-primate-model-reveals-early-stage-Alzheimere28099s-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f0eed7e-f651-4344-9577-556b83888980 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:12:00 -0400 Nonhuman primate model reveals early-stage Alzheimer’s disease progression
研究深入了解肠道微生物组多样性和 2 型糖尿病风险布里格姆、布罗德和哈佛大学陈氏学院的研究人员发现，特定的细菌种类和菌株与肠道微生物组功能的变化以及人患 2 型糖尿病的风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-offers-insights-into-gut-microbiome-diversity-and-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-offers-insights-into-gut-microbiome-diversity-and-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b9f4d51-82dc-47fb-9671-c3d81838de96 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:10:00 -0400 Study offers insights into gut microbiome diversity and type 2 diabetes risk
“G900”基因增强子可能在哮喘相关炎症中发挥关键作用2 型辅助 T (Th2) 细胞在哮喘的炎症反应中发挥着复杂的作用。蛋白质 GATA3 水平升高会刺激这些细胞的成熟。因此，增强 GATA3 基因表达的被称为增强子的基因区域与哮喘相关炎症有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/e2809cG900e2809d-gene-enhancers-may-play-a-pivotal-role-in-asthma-linked-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/e2809cG900e2809d-gene-enhancers-may-play-a-pivotal-role-in-asthma-linked-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a47ef16-9057-4e39-bcfd-3db55349369b Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:04:00 -0400 “G900” gene enhancers may play a pivotal role in asthma-associated inflammation
研究发现 40-54 岁糖尿病成人患癌症的风险增加新研究显示，糖尿病会显着增加患癌症的风险，尤其是 40-54 岁的人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Research-finds-increased-cancer-risk-in-diabetic-adults-ages-40-54-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Research-finds-increased-cancer-risk-in-diabetic-adults-ged-40-54-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99a36672-64b4-424e-ba1a-73155ee05c0c Wed, 26 Jun 2024 01:57:00 -0400 Research finds increased cancer risk in diabetic adults aged 40-54 years
同理心会加剧冲突对儿童健康的负面影响宾夕法尼亚州立大学健康与人类发展学院的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，与缺乏同理心的孩子相比，自称更有同理心的孩子在面对更多的父母间冲突时更有可能表现出健康状况较差的迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Empathetic-Children-May-Have-Poorer-Health-In-The-Face-Of-Interparental-Conflict.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Empathetic-Children-May-Have-Poorer-Health-In-The-Face-Of-Interparental-Conflict.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a91e944c-29e8-4cb9-94d9-7dffd786a889 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 01:48:00 -0400 Empathy intensifies negative health effects of conflict for kids
以医院为基础的捐献者护理与更长的肺移植存活率相关宾夕法尼亚大学研究人员的一项新研究首次检查了从美国运营的两种已故器官捐献护理机构中回收的器官的肺移植结果的差异。这项研究今天发表在《美国医学会杂志》网络公开版上，提供了可以改善全国患者器官捐献和移植过程的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Hospital-based-donor-care-linked-to-longer-lung-transplant-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Hospital-based-donor-care-linked-to-longer-lung-transplant-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ebd6511-ece3-40fa-8be5-a3f743e1ad88 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 01:41:00 -0400 Hospital-based donor care linked to longer lung transplant survival rates
研究为调查糖尿病相关转录因子提供了资源科学家们绘制了人类胰腺 β 细胞和肝细胞中转录因子 HNF4A 和 HNF1A 调节的基因靶标的综合图谱。该研究发表在《自然通讯》杂志上，揭示了 HNF4A 和 HNF1A 调节的常见和组织特异性分子途径，这两种蛋白质具有控制胰腺和肝脏发育和功能的重要功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-provides-resource-for-investigating-diabetes-linked-transcription-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-provides-resource-for-investigating-diabetes-linked-transcription-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68324f35-9f77-4700-81e9-32dc5e85457b Wed, 26 Jun 2024 01:22:14 -0400 Study provides resource for investigating diabetes-linked transcription factors
